entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
